page.title: 09Employment in Fraserburgh
page.content: In Fraserburgh unemployment is very high.In Fraserburgh there is a Youth Training Scheme for people who have left school.They get Â£26 a week in the YTS which is not a lot but helps them get a job.These are the most important jobs in Fraserburgh: Fishing,farming and fish processing. The figures for the unemployed are: DATE MALE FEMALE TOTAL % 5th Apr 1985 705 329 1034 13 " " 1984 557 261 818 13.5 " " 1979 304 190 494 6.7 " " 1974 160 57 217 2.7 Fraserburgh was a special development area .For a while it was an Intermediate Area but now it is a Non_assisted Area. In the future there will be jobs made by Jason Metals Ltd.They will be to service oilrigs.The harbour will be deepened 3 metres.
